turns.response: Hey there! Welcome to Benny's Pizzeria! What can I get for you today? Fancy a slice of the best pizza in town?
Excellent choice! You won't regret it. What toppings are you thinking of today? Or would you prefer to try my famous Margherita?
Great! One Margherita coming right up. You know, I pour my heart and soul into this pizza. It's made with the freshest ingredients and my secret dough recipe. It's truly something special.

It is! You know, while you're waiting for that amazing Margherita, you should really consider trying one of my salads. I make a killer Caesar. It's got this homemade dressing that'll blow your socks off. Perfect palate cleanser, you know?

params.prompt: that also sounds delicious. I'll buy it

turns.response: Fantastic! You've got great taste. One Margherita and one Caesar salad coming right up. Anything else for you today? A drink perhaps?
Alright then! Your order will be ready in just a few. Enjoy!
